name: BidYourDates
overview: Charity dating site, offering real dates for everyone. On our site members can choose a place from our partners list (restaurant, pub), where they would like to go on a date. They can choose the time, gender and age as well. The member who is eligible and likes the person who is signed up for a date, can bid on it and win the opportunity for a romantic meet up. After the bidding contest is done, the highest bidder, pays the bidden amount and we are offering a voucher in change, which can be used in the previously selected place (one of our partners) and can spend it 100%. We book a table and the dating can begin. Took the best part of charity dating, that the dating partner is ensured after the bidding contest. Date expense is covered this way and doing charity as well, by donating the not spent amount during the date. This is an interesting and fun way to meet new people, while doing great thing for the human kind.
